post:
Hello, I am Karim from VPSlices LTD, we've decided to make a special promotion since this is our first offer thread here, we have two locations, NJ, USA and Moscow, RU, so check it out!


##LET Specials: 

###Special OVZ 1 (10 in stock):
* **CPU**: 1 vCore @ 3.5 Ghz
* **RAM**: 2 GB DDR4 RAM
* **Disk**: 100 GB SSD 
* **Bandwidth**: 5 TB @ 250 Mbps
* £2.75 GBP / $3.50 USD monthly
* Moscow, RU: https://my.vpslices.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=14
* NJ, USA: https://my.vpslices.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=11

###Special OVZ 2 (10 in stock):
* **CPU**: 2 vCore @ 3.5 Ghz
* **RAM**: 4 GB DDR4 RAM
* **Disk**: 200 GB SSD 
* **Bandwidth**: 5 TB @ 500 Mbps
* £4.00 GBP / $5.10 USD monthly
* Moscow, RU: https://my.vpslices.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=15
* NJ, USA: https://my.vpslices.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=12


###What we provide with each VPS:
* **Semi Managed**: Our techs will help you with managing your VPS.
* **30 Minutes Support**: We usually reply to tickets within 30 minutes.
* **Extra Mile!**: We will go the extra mile to assist you, always!
* **Instant Deploy**: Just order and get the VPS running in seconds.
* **Love**: We love our customers, hugs and kisses can be requested via live chat. :)

###What we accept:
* PayPal
* Skrill
* Bitcoin
* 2CheckOut
* Payza

###Legal Documents:
* ToS: https://vpslices.com/tos.html
* AUP: https://vpslices.com/aup.html
* PP: https://vpslices.com/privacy.html

###Looking for a custom quote or having a question about something? [Contact us](https://vpslices.com/contact.html)!

Thank you!
